title: Zepto | SDE 1 | Bengaluru | Offer
content:
Education: B Tech from an NIT
Years of Experience: 1.8 years
Previous Experience: MNC
Previous CTC: 20 lpa
Company: Zepto
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 26lpa
Signing Bonus: 1 lakh
ESOP: 6 lpa (Vested over 4 years) (25% every year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 28.5lpa for 1st year
Benefits: Gym reimbursement (upto 10K per year), mobile bill reimbursement (600 per month), standard insurance benefits (self), parental insurance on 50% copay basis.
Other details: Negotiated once.
Note- Did not join as got a counter from current company with extra pay and SDE2 position.

title: Microsoft | L60 | HELP!
content:
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L60
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: 19 LPA
Performance: (0-20%) of Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3L + 1L
Stock bonus: 45k (over 4 years)

Existing JOB : (15L Base + 1.5L Performance), 2+ years of experience
No other offers in hand

I think this is low, not sure what to do here. Negotiation seems to be not happening.

title: Target | Senior Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: Btech (Non CSE) Top 2 private college.
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: Well Known startup(Unicorn)

Current CTC : 12 LPA ( All fixed )
Date of the Offer: 1 may 2024
Company: Target
Title/Level: Senior Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 23 LPA fixed
Relocation: Relocation(flights + accomodation)
Sign On : NA
Stock bonus: NA
Variable : 10 %
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 25.3LPA
Benefits: Free food, Cab, standard target benefits.

Am I getting Lowballed here? I dont have any Counter offers yet.
Appreciate your Insights.

title: Microsoft Compensation | L60
content:
Years of Experience: 2 years 9 months
Prior Experience: SDE II @ Oracle
Prev Compensation -> 17 LPA (Stocks + Salary + Bonus)
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L60
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 23 LPA Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5 LPA
Stock bonus: 40K (4 years)
Bonus: Max 20% -> 4.6 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 31.2 - 35.8 LPA

My only concern is the Level. Is L60 reasonable or should I request for L61?
